Follows the whacky adventures of the young orphan Pauline from when she first leaves the foundling home. She becomes a tutor to a crazy 12 year old prince in India who wants to make her the start of his harem. She gets sold into slavery and travels through the jungle where both a big game hunter and a gorilla fall in love with her. She gets frozen in a block of ice etc etc until she finally gets reunited with the love of her life.


TRIVIA: This was never intended to be made as a movie by Universal Studios and in fact, is a compilation of the first 3 episodes of a failed TV series. More info available in torrent file.
